page.title: 02Farming,Agnes,Scilly.
page.content: Up at Higher Town there are 4 farms growing potatoes and flowers in small fields with tall hedges for windbreaks.Narcissi and Daffodils (Paperwhites + Soleil d'or) are the most popular flowers. In the old days people used to grow and sell Violets,Jacks and Botham. Potatoes are grown as a break crop to give the ground a rest from flowers.On all farms there are 3 sections which are called Rough Grazing,Pasture and Arable.There are 3 seasons of growing flowers and food and they are Flower season which lasts from October to March,Potatoe season which is just in April and Bulb season which lasts from June to August.The farmers send to London,Leeds,Leicester,Birmingham and Gatesheads markets.The most important things are windbreaks.
